column1: 134214,Welfare Centre Manager,,"Liaise between departments or other groups to improve function or communication
column3: Develop programs, policies or services that are culturally appropriate
column15: Prepare financial documents, reports or budgets
column25: Represent the organisation in external relations
column27: Assess individual or community needs for educational or social services
column33: Prepare staff schedules or work assignments
column37: Coordinate and administer community or social service programs
column41: Prepare proposals or grant applications to obtain project funding
column43: Implement organisational process or policy changes
column45: Analyse risks to minimise losses or damages
column47: Develop procedures to evaluate organisational activities",0.06953966699314398
